data.title: Contact Us â Consulate General of the People's Republic of China in Penang
data.text:
Basic Information

1. Address:

Consulate General of the People's Republic of China in Penang, 28 B&C, Jalan Tunku Abdul Rahman, Taman Selamat, 10350 George Town, Pulau Pinang.

2. Official website of Consulate General:

Official website: http://penang.china-consulate.gov.cn/eng/

3. Consular district: Penang, Perak, Kedah, Perlis

4. Office hours:

(Monday - Friday, excluding Saturday, Sunday, and holidays)

9:00 am - 12:00 pm

2:00 pm - 5:00 pm

5. E-mail: chinaconsulatepenang@gmail.com;âpenang@csm.mfa.gov.cnâ(consularâaffairs)

6. Area code: 00604

7. Fax: 00604-2189798

8. Phone: 00604-2189795

Reminder:

For consular protection & assistance and consular document & certificate services, please contact as follows:

(I) Consular protection and assistance for Chinese citizens:

1. Phone:

(i) 0086-10-12308 or 0086-10-65612308 (24 hours)

(ii) 00604-2189803 (office hours: 9:00 am - 5:00 pm)

(iii) 0060-111059 2308 (24 hours)

2. Email:âpenang@csm.mfa.gov.cn

(II) Visa / Notarization / Authentication for Chinese citizens:

Our Consulate General has not yet provided the consular documents service. Please contact the Embassy of China in Malaysia for related matters. Contact details are as follows:

1. Phone: 006-03-21645272 (Hotline for Chinese citizen documents)

2. Consultation hours: 24 hours automatically telephone answering service for a recorded introduction of document application instructions. Please be kindly noted that manual consultation hours are 9:30 am - 11:30 am and 2:00 pm - 4:00 pm (Kind reminder: Due to the large number of daily manual consultation calls, you may need to wait when the line is busy. It is recommended to use the Chinese Citizen Documents email address for consultations.)

3. E-mail: lingshikl@gmail.com (Chinese citizen documents)

4. Fax: 006-03-21636809

(III) Chinese visa application for foreign citizens:

Our Consulate General has not yet provided the visa service. Please contact the Chinese Visa Application Service Center or the Visa Office of Chinese Visa Application Service Centre in Penang for related matters. Please refer to the Embassy of China in Malaysia link for more details: http://my.china-embassy.gov.cn/eng/fwzc/lsyw/ã

1. Chinese Visa Application Service Center:

Phone: 006-03-89663925

E-mail: klcentre@visaforchina.org

Address: Level 6, Hampshire Place Office, Jalan Mayang Sari, 50450 Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia

2. Visa Office of Chinese Visa Application Service Centre in Penang:

Phone: 006-03-89663925

Email: penangcentre@visaforchina.org

3. Application of visa for diplomatic and service purposes for foreign citizens holding diplomatic passport, service passport or ordinary passport:

Phone: 006-03-21645272

Email: lingshikl@gmail.com

Fax: 006-03-21636809

Address: 1st Floor, Plaza OSK, 25 Jalan Ampang, 50450 Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia

Kind reminder: Due to the large number of daily manual consultation calls, you may need to wait when the line is busy. It is recommended to email to relevant departments according to your needs.

â

Offices and Contact Information

â

Deputy Consul General: DingâQiao

Bilateral Relations Section:

Phone: 00604-2261384 (Commercial office)

Consular and Overseas Chinese Affairs Section:

Phone:00604-2189792 (Overseas Chinese affairs. For consular protection and assistance and documents service, please refer to the contact information above.)

Administrative Section:

Phone: 00604-2189795
